0101110100111011 0001111011011110 0 -> sum: 0111110000011001, cout: 0

1110111000010001 0001110100001101 1 -> sum: 0000101100011111, cout: 1

1110111100010110 0001010111110101 0 -> sum: 0000010100001011, cout: 1
